resources.string: Welcome to the application-based learning platform! Play and learn at the same time with our interactive adventures!
Hello, I am from Security Tech. Here to investigate for a crime. Can you please show me the CCTV footage of yesterday noon?
Sure, but am afraid that the image is not clear!
Hello, I am from Security Tech. Here to investigate for a crime. Can you please tell me what you witnessed yesterday?
Sure! I was leaving the building when I saw a guy attack the truck driver waiting there! I could not see his face but I noticed some mark on his arm.
Good job with the investigation! We now have to get more details from the CCTV image! How will you do it?
How will you get more information from the CCTV image?
